thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 8 of 2268
thread.title: Steven cooper

author: Steven cooper
title: Steven cooper
text:
Buying online can be a little hit and miss at times. Not with this Company. The supply of free samples, the ease of ordering online, the ease of measuring, the on time delivery, the extra blinds in the package in case you make a mistake, and the reasonable price, meant that we had the blinds for 7 windows and patio doors delivered within a week. All fitted perfectly, and easily, and the quality is as expected. Well done Blinds2go.
Already two friends have seen the blinds and will be ordering.
